entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You have destroyed Cal Handro and stopped his treacherous double-dealing. Both the Rebel Alliance and the Wookiees of Kashyyyk are grateful for your heroism.
entries.journal_entry_description: Find out who is still using Cal Handro's resources.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Go to the Imperial base where Cal Handro's shield generator is located.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Your contact wants you to find the base of the Binayre pirates.  Once you have arrived kill pirates until you find the communications array passkey.
entries.task03_comm_message_text: Looks like you got the code. Good. Now go locate Handro's ship with the Communications Array. Remember that you will have 10 minutes to take down the shield generator and destroy Handro's ship. Good luck!
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Dak Ralter sent you a message: Looks like you got the code. Good. Now go locate Handro's ship with the Communications Array. Remember that you will have 10 minutes to take down the shield generator and destroy Handro's ship. Good luck!
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Use the communications array passkey to access the communications array and locate Cal Handro's ship.
entries.task05_encounter_where_message: Cal Handro's ship has been discovered!  He is located in %TO.
entries.task05_item_used_system_message: Cal Handro's ship is vulnerable. Take him out!
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Find the terminal that controls the shield generator quickly. Once that has been turned off, Cal Handro's ship will be vulnerable. A second team in Corellia space should be ready to take him out.
entries.task05_journal_entry_title: Disable the Shield Generator then Eliminate Handro's Ship
entries.task06_comm_message_text: Thank you for your help. The Alliance is grateful for all that you've done, and I owe you my grattitude.
